title: Botting/Autoplay

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: So yeah I was playing a bot game and all 4 of my team mates were botting/Auto playing and we lost in a freaking coop vs ai **beginner bot** game. And that's just insane, I was extremely pissed off that there were FOUR people doing the exact thing and i think there needs to be maybe a temporary (or permanent) IP ban for those people. Btw i was playing master yi I couldn't carry because I was playing AP master yi then soon switched over to AD since we were losing and I also lost gold for that reason.

replies.body: They'll be banned in the next wave.
